name: Tiny Dentist (itch)
description:
Shadow of the Orthodontist!

Climb around a giant guy as a little guy, using his hair and face for handholds!

Help the big guy out by pulling out all his loose pesky teeth!

Made in 48 Hours, from scratch, for the Ludum Dare 38 Competition: "It's a Small World"

Open Source: https://github.com/joshsafran/TinyDentist

Ludum Dare 38 Compo
